original_title: 2024 will be year of elections: Ruwan
original_body_lines: Deputy Leader of the United National Party (UNP) Ruwan Wijewardene said his party will likely form an alliance to face upcoming elections.
“A number of opposition MPs have indicated their willingness to join the President,” he said.
Wijewardene added that the year 2024 will be a year of elections.
